name: test_e2e_with_logs[014_SQLI_ADV_089]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ADV_089` |
| **Name** | EXEC xp_cmdshell Injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | advanced |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `EXEC xp_cmdshell('whoami')`
